png

Class TextEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • png.TextEntry

  • public class TextEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a textual metadata entry within a PNG chunk, consisting of a tag type, keyword, and associated text value. Typically used to store entries from textual chunks such as tEXt, iTXt, or zTXt.
    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

      • TextEntry

        public TextEntry(TagPngChunk tag,
                 java.lang.String keyword,
                 java.lang.String text)
        Constructs a TextEntry with a PNG tag, keyword, and associated text value.
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag indicating the PNG chunk type
        keyword - the keyword name identifying the entry
        text - the text value associated with the keyword
